title: A former slave who became a cowboy, a rancher, and a Texas legend
dot: digraph G{rankdir=TB;node[style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue, fontcolor=black];subgraph cluster_intro{label="Introduction";style=filled;bgcolor=lightgrey;intro1[label="Digital subscribers can listen to this article" shape=box];intro2[label="Subscribe for audio stories and more" shape=box];intro3[label="History of Daniel Webster Wallace - 80 John" shape=box];}subgraph cluster_culture{label="Cowboy Culture";style=filled;bgcolor=lightyellow;culture1[label="Mixed Race Support in Cowboy Culture" shape=box];culture2[label="Wallace: A Respected Cowboy" shape=box];culture3[label="Diverse Cowboy Heritage" shape=box];}subgraph cluster_achievements{label="Achievements of 80 John";style=filled;bgcolor=lightgreen;achieve1[label="8,800 Acre Ranch Owner" shape=box];achieve2[label="Notable Community Contributions" shape=box];achieve3[label="Inducted into Hall of Great Westerners" shape=box];achieve4[label="Pioneered Ranching Innovations" shape=box];}subgraph cluster_legacy{label="Legacy";style=filled;bgcolor=lightcoral;legacy1[label="Recognition of Contributions of Black Cowboys" shape=box];legacy2[label="Trust for Education and Land Sustainability" shape=box];legacy3[label="Preservation of Family Heritage" shape=box];}intro1->intro2->intro3;intro3->culture1->culture2->culture3;culture3->achieve1->achieve2->achieve3->achieve4;achieve4->legacy1->legacy2->legacy3;}
